titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, October 7, 1963

mods.tableOfContents: Maude Reynolds Memorial Mission. Pastor Ted Reynolds. Announcements. Oklahoma – Teresa White and Donna White. When We All Get to Heaven. Amazing Grace – Leroy White. Kneel at the Cross – Quartet. 23rd Psalm – Maude Reynolds (Caddo). Whispering Hope – James and Polly Stuart. When God Gives His Love in My Heart – Leroy White and Delores and 2 children. Does Jesus Care – Maude Reynolds. Message – Ted Reynolds. When Could I Go – Mr. and Mrs. White and Mr. and Mrs. Stuart. He Lives – Leroy White. Announcements. Leaning on the Everlasting Arms – Group. Caddo Prayer – Maude Reynolds. What a Friend We Have in Jesus – Group. Prayer – Leroy White.
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please using the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
